title: Shopping Cart
description: The React shopping cart project simulates the experience of an user buying online goods. It has been developed with Typescript, Tailwind and dummyjson API. I could improve many concepts when developing it, such as Tailwind skills and component architecture.

title: Photo Album
description: React/TypeScript photo album loading data from Unsplash API, designed with Tailwind. This project allows someone to filter photos by category or/and specific name.

title: To Do List
description: To Do List is a project that allows people to create a list of tasks and delete each task. It was developed on ReactJS, TailwindCSS and TypeScript. Also all the tasks are stored on the LocalStorage and then shown on the screen.

title: Quiz Game
description: This project is an Interactive Quiz Game that was created based on technologies such as: vanilla JavaScript, CSS, HTML, LocalStorage, APIs. The quiz game is based on multiple-choice questions along with a timer. Then, the answers are saved on Local Storage, being printed out on the screen by the end of the game.

title: Team Generator
description: Team Generator is a Node.Js terminal project that utilizes object oriented programming concepts with the help of inquirer to prompt for team member's information and then create a web page with all team members.
